BrickBreaker
  Paddle
   fields: size, x, y
   void moveRight()
   void moveLeft()
   void display()
   boolean collision(Ball b)

  Ball
   fields: diameter, x, y
   boolean bounceVertical()
   boolean bounceHorizontal()
   void update()  // handles bounces off walls
   void display()
  
  Brick
   fields: width, height, x, y, color
   void display()
   boolean collision(Ball b)
   - break brick // save for later
  
  Score
    fields: score
    void display()
    void increment()
    void reset()
    int getScore() // could eliminate
